title: is it weird i got permanently banned from logging into league from the client but can log in here
body: i got banned because i was using my parents credit card to get skins... yes i know. anyways they called their credit card company and launched an investigation. the next day when i wanted to look at the transactions it said i couldn't log in because my account was permanently banned. but i checked today on the website and i logged in easy and changed my password. is this normal

replies.body:
Yup, that's normal. Technically, they're separate, and someone can be banned from the boards, but not the game, or the game but not the boards.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
